column4: hmmm i think my router is going bad . . . . my theory is that it is the wan port only as the other ones work . . . any ideas for help?
i had one where the router worked, but the incoming internet connection port didn't.. brownout did it. linksys wrt54g
mine is the gp2 from linksys
use hwinfo and set the v&h rates correctly in xorg.conf
i also find googling just the monitor's model # returns the v&h rates the most
did a ping from all computers connect to router . . . 100% . . . .and then 20% from computer to router just above this one
it did for me.. make sure xorg/gedm isn't running
then i pinged the one above directly from ubuntu
